document_data.name: Lhaera
document_data.mainbody: '''Lhaera''' was an inhabitant of [[the Dalelands]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: As of {{yearlink|1357}}, she wasn't young anymore.
document_data.Possessions: She wore patched clothes and owned at least one cauldron. [[Rathan Thentraver]] had blessed her house in the name of [[Tymora]].
document_data.History: She was visited by Rathan and [[Torm (adventurer)|Torm]] of the [[Knights of Myth Drannor]] one day in early [[Flamerule]]{{cite book/The Forgotten Realms Atlas|105}} of {{yearlink|1357}}, to bring her daughter a kitten, [[Snuggleguts]]. She had been healed by one of them recently, almost certainly by Rathan specifically.
